chunk:
Cliganic Organic Pumpkin Seed Oil

Brand: Cliganic

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: 100% Cucurbita Pepo (Pumpkin) Seed oil

Directions: Apply 2-3 drops of Cliganic Organic Pumpkin Oil onto hands. Rub together to warm before massaging onto a clean, dry face and neck, avoiding eye areas. Use morning and evening, and as needed. Cl

g, and as needed. Cliganic Organic Pumpkin oil can be layered under additional creams and oil-based products for added moisture.

Warnings: For external use only. Keep away from flames and high heat. Keep out of reach of children. Discontinue use immediately if redness or irritation occurs.
